#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<stdbool.h>
#define mod 1000000007
typedef  long int ll;
inline ll getn(){
	ll n=0, c=getchar();
	while(c < '0' || c > '9')
		c = getchar();
	while(c >= '0' && c <= '9')
		n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + c - '0', c = getchar();
	return n;
}
#define     max(a,b)	    ((a)>(b)?(a):(b))
#define     min(a,b)	    ((a)<(b)?(a):(b))
ll gcd(ll a,ll b)
{ll t;
while(b)
{t=b;
b=a%b;
a=t;
}
return a;
}
ll power(ll a, ll b) 
{
	ll x = 1, y = a;
    while(b > 0) 
	{
        if(b%2 == 1) 
		{
            x=(x*y);
            if(x>mod) x%=mod;
        }
        y = (y*y);
        if(y>mod) y%=mod;
        b /= 2;
    }
    return x;
}

ll dp[200005][26]={0};
int main()
{
ll n,i,j,l,ans;
char str[200005];
scanf("%s",str);

n=strlen(str);

for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{
	l=str[i]-'a';
	
	for(j=0;j<26;j++)
	dp[i+1][j]=dp[i][j];
	
	dp[i+1][l]++;
}


ll val[26];
ll t,r;
t=getn();
while(t--)
{
	l=getn();
	r=getn();
	
	l--;
	
	for(i=0;i<26;i++)
	{
	val[i]=dp[r][i]-dp[l][i];
//	printf("%lld ",val[i]);
	}
	
		
		l=0;
		j=0;
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
		{
		if(val[i]&1)
		{
			j+=val[i]-1;
			l=1;
			
		}
		else
		{
		j+=val[i];
		}
		}
		
//	printf("%lld %lld\n",j,l);
		j+=l;
		
		printf("%ld\n",j);
	
	
	
	
}
return 0;
}
